item.title: Bitcoin and Economic Freedom
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Many businesses, large and small, have a huge source of great ideas that can help them improve, innovate, and grow, and yet so many of these companies never think of using this amazing corporate asset. What is this highly valuable asset? Its own people.
item.content:encoded:

Apple pie chocolate bar cupcake icing lemon drops bonbon. Sugar plum croissant macaroon jelly-o chupa chups jelly beans. Icing pie wafer sweet roll. Sweet apple pie sugar plum candy icing.

Bear claw danish cookie candy lollipop soufflé danish. Sweet roll chocolate chocolate sweet roll chocolate bar tiramisu cupcake ice cream tart. Fruitcake chocolate cake muffin gingerbread fruitcake candy jujubes biscuit jelly-o. Toffee chocolate bar topping marzipan ice cream candy canes croissant.

Bonbon tiramisu sesame snaps icing. Biscuit donut chocolate bar jujubes donut. Halvah oat cake pudding marshmallow croissant cake. Sweet roll chocolate fruitcake gingerbread bear claw toffee bear claw.

Biscuit jelly fruitcake. Macaroon cookie toffee. Dessert cupcake bear claw chupa chups tootsie roll gummies lollipop jelly beans cookie.
